message.body: So I've mentioned how much I hate food smells on the subway... I thought fried anything was the worst until... i stood next to a guy who was eating spoon fulls of peanut butter from the jar. Unbelievable.
What?! Sheesh, you have the craziest experiences :)
Seriously, who brings peanut butter on a subway? And a spoon?! Not a plastic spoon either, but silver spoon.
